text:
Youth electrocuted inside TNSTC depot

A 28-year-old youth, S. Kannan of Nandhi Reddiyapatti was electrocuted to death inside the TNSTC depot on Monday evening.

The police said that the victim, a contract labourer, had stepped on a live wire of a welding machine while involved in a bus body building work. The incident happened around 5 p.m. He died on the spot.

The Virudhunagar Rural police are investigating.
title: Virudhunagar/Briefly
